tool.name: OGS: removeMeshElements
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'removeMeshElements'.
tool.command: removeMeshElements $invert #if str($z_max): --z-max '$z_max' #end if #if str($z_min): --z-min '$z_min' #end if #if str($y_max): --y-max '$y_max' #end if #if str($y_min): --y-min '$y_min' #end if #if str($x_max): --x-max '$x_max' #end if #if str($x_min): --x-min '$x_min' #end if $zero_volume --element-type '$element_type' #if str($property_name): --property-name '$property_name' #end if #if str($property_value): --property-value '$property_value' #end if #if str($min_value): --min-value '$min_value' #end if #if str($max_value): --max-value '$max_value' #end if $outside $inside --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file' --mesh-output-file output_1.vtu

param.name: property_value
param.label: property value
param.help: value of selected property to be removed

param.name: min_value
param.label: min value
param.help: minimum value of range for selected property

param.name: max_value
param.label: max value
param.help: maximum value of range for selected property

param.name: outside
param.label: outside
param.help: remove all elements outside the given property range

param.name: inside
param.label: inside
param.help: remove all elements inside the given property range

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtu). the file containing the input mesh

tool.help: This tool runs the **removeMeshElements** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
